5.1.3. IAR Embedded Workbench¶

The following steps show how to add ITTIA DB IoT to an IAR Embedded Workbench project.

  1. Select Create New Project… from the Project menu.

  2. Choose the C++ main project template and press OK to save the project.

  3. Select Options… from the Project menu.

  4. In the C/C++ Compiler category select the Preprocessor tab.

    1. Add $DBDIR\include to the Additional include directories.
    2. Add OS_OTHER to the Defined symbols.

  5. In the Linker category select the Config tab.

    Check the Override default box for the Linker configuration file and set it to $DBDIR\example\generic.icf. This file has been configured with a heap of sufficient size for the default file storage configuration.

  6. In the General Options category select the Library Configuration tab.

    Set the Library to Full when using the generic stdio.h file interface.

  7. Press OK to save the options.

  8. Apply the same settings to the project’s Debug configuration.

  9. Select Add Files… from the Project menu. Set the File name filter to Library/Object Files and choose $DBDIR\lib\dbcppapi.a, $DBDIR\lib\ittiaiot.a, and $DBDIR\lib\oslib.a.
